text:
OpsTalent| Wrocław, Poland| Full-time, Onsite| Frontend 12k - 15k złotych b2b net

OpsTalent is a young company currently looking for an experienced (senior) Frontend Developer who can lead a team of less experienced developers, mentor them and work close with our Head of IT (creating processes, choosing technologies for new projects)

We need someone who is experienced in React.js or Angular.js (eventually),

We're creating web aplications for Swiss and US startups, right now the newest project is for courier industry: management and resource planning, there's new project every 2-3 months,

More info and apply: http://opstalent.com/job/front-end-developer/
